title: 226. Andy & DJ CTI: Lia Thomas' Unfair Advantage, Chris Cuomo Hush Money & Shaq Against Mandate
itunes:title: 226. Andy & DJ CTI: Lia Thomas' Unfair Advantage, Chris Cuomo Hush Money & Shaq Against Mandate
description: In today's episode, Andy & DJ discuss Lia Thomas' teammates urging Penn not to fight against the new USA swimming rules towards transgender athletes, CNN offering to pay Chris Cuomo $9 million dollars in hush money to protect Jeff Zucker's departure from the network and Shaquille O'Neal speaking up against the Covid-19 vaccination mandates.
content:encoded: In today's episode, Andy & DJ discuss Lia Thomas' teammates urging Penn not to fight against the new USA swimming rules towards transgender athletes, CNN offering to pay Chris Cuomo $9 million dollars in hush money to protect Jeff Zucker's departure from the network and Shaquille O'Neal speaking up against the Covid-19 vaccination mandates.
